name: CAREPLAN_PT_TASK_INFO
description: This table contains information about patient-assigned tasks in the care plan.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the care plan record.

columns.name: TOTAL_PT_INST_CNT
columns.description: The total number of patient-assigned task instances in the care plan which are no longer actionable or have been acted upon.

columns.name: COMP_PT_INST_CNT
columns.description: The total number of completed patient-assigned task instances in the care plan.
